definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Night wind Department, poplar leaves rustles, they are singing from the songs?
sentences.chinese: 夜风处，白杨树的叶子沙沙响，它们是在吟唱离歌吗？

sentences.english: Withered leaves, singing songs from the song, how many sorrows and joys.
sentences.chinese: 叶的凋零，吟唱着一曲离歌，几多的悲喜。

definition: late at night/in the dead of night
sad melody/stirring strains/elegy/dirge/threnody/sing with solemn fervor
Weiyang District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
(literary) not ended/not yet over/close to the end
the other end of the world/a faraway place
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)
to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
